evidence_in_dialogue: [[Mrs._Haddick]] who could have done this to my baby ?
[[Brass]] so , do you want to tell us how a dead kid 's blood ended up on the bottom of your sneaker , benny ?
[[Benny_Lizzio]] sometimes i go to the construction site just to hang out
[[Warrick]] is that where brian hit you ?
[[Sara]] we have three hammers and four suspects
